apple_vendor_description: Apple's rendition of the kiss: person, woman, medium-dark skin tone, medium skin tone emoji captures a moment of deep affection with its rich coloring and smooth, sculpted form. The faces, rendered with Apple's signature realistic lighting and subtle 3D shading, exude warmth and intimacy.  This emoji, with its soft rounded edges and nuanced skin tones, serves as a beautiful and inclusive representation of romantic connection and loving gestures.
